body.p: Semantically significant blank space in the original can be tagged with the <space> element. The attribute value pair @dim="horizontal | vertical" indicates whether the space is horizontal or vertical.
The use of the <space> element is optional (level 3).
Frequent use cases for <space> can be found in tables of contents and lists, for example.

example.title: Blank Space in Tables of Contents

body.p: But also in the continuous text, paragraphs can be separated from each other by significantly more space than usual in the surrounding text.
